titles.title: MP141 Father, Your Love Is Precious

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Father, Your love is precious beyond all loves,
Father, Your love overwhelms me.
Father, Your love is precious beyond all loves,
Father, Your love overwhelms me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
So I lift up my hands, an expression of my love,
And I give You my heart in joyful obedience.
Father, Your love is precious beyond all loves,
Father, Your love overwhelms me.
